nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: Analyze Test Run
         run: >-
           pip3 -q install agithub &&
-          python3 .github/scripts/flake.py --cmd "mvn -ntp -q verify" -i 10 --token "${{ github.token }}"
+          python3 .github/scripts/flake.py --cmd "mvn -ntp -q verify" -i 8 --token "${{ github.token }}"

nodes.bodyText: As I mentioned in the description, the GitHub action takes more than 1 hour to run which causes the GitHub token to expire. This means that it cannot create/update the issue because the token has expired. AFAIK there's no workaround, so I'm just trying to make it run in less than 1 hour.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: Analyze Test Run
         run: >-
           pip3 -q install agithub &&
-          python3 .github/scripts/flake.py --cmd "mvn -ntp -q verify" -i 10 --token "${{ github.token }}"
+          python3 .github/scripts/flake.py --cmd "mvn -ntp -q verify" -i 8 --token "${{ github.token }}"
